entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
